Demand.definition: a formal request or call for something
Demand.origin: [a shareholder must first make a on the corporation's board of directors to act "R. C. Clark"]

1.definition: a formal request or call for something (as payment for a debt) esp. based on a right or made with force [a shareholder must first make a on the corporation's board of directors to act "R. C. Clark"] [a written for payment]

2.definition: something demanded [anyagainst the estate] see also

on demand:upon presentation and request.definition: vtto ask or call for with force, authority, or by legal rightclaim as due [any party may a trial by jury of any issue triable of right by a jury "Rule 38(b)"]
